name: Ibis Muenchen City

reviews.title: A good inexpensive hotel
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel on two occasions in July 07. The rooms while small were very clean and comfortable. The staff at the hotel were very friendly and the hotel has free internet access in the lobby. We had a problem with the air conditioning in the room which we had to ask to be looked at twice but as soon as they realised that it was actually broken they moved us to another room as soon as possible. It is about a 20 min walk into town and 4mins walk to the station. There is a bagel shop next door and a patisserie across the road so we got breakfast from there rather than dining at the hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed in this Ibis for 1 night during a quick trip to Munich. This hotel met our needs perfectly:
reviews.title: Great Location!

reviews.text: - It was very convenient to both the train station and the city center.
reviews.title: Comfortable, clean, warm hotel and good location

reviews.text: - It was clean, with a simple yet perfectly adequate room for one night.
reviews.title: Comfortable, Convenient, Great Price
Excellent Value
reviews.text: - The staff was friendly and spoke english.
